promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive epic butterfly fighting-type pokemon with golden wings. It can be found in canyon-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or butterfly. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Goldeonix, a a massive epic butterfly fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in canyon-like environments It has the following abilities: Rock Drill Dive. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "butterfly", "fighting" or "Goldeonix". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, butterfly-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, red and purple ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This titanic, radiant lepidopteran is adept in rocky gorges, using Rock Drill Dive to navigate terrain. Its beauty masks a fearsome warrior spirit.
